title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Last-minute domestic United award flights tick up ahead of holidays
items.description: United MileagePlus awards are more expensive ahead of the holidays. Here's how to save on award tickets.

items.title: 5 reasons why I’m applying for the Capital One Venture X
items.description: The Venture X offers big value for a surprisingly low effective cost. From lounge access to flexible miles, here’s why it became my next travel card.

items.title: Know your rights and protect your privacy: What citizens need to know about reentering the US
items.description: What to expect when you return from an international trip, plus ways to protect your digital privacy in the event of a device search.

items.title: Skagway's White Pass Railway cruise excursions in Alaska: All you need to know
items.description: The White Pass and Yukon Route Railway is a staple of any visit to Skagway, Alaska, particularly if you arrive by cruise ship. Here's what you should ...

items.title: Delta flash sale: Fly to London, Paris and other European cities from 20,400 SkyMiles
items.description: Delta just dropped a great flash sale with award rates to European cities like London, Paris, Munich and Amsterdam for as low as 20,400 SkyMiles.
